name: Doodba - Clean the page!
description:
Made for Mini Jam 82: Doodle

  • Clean up some pages filled with old and unwanted doodles!
  • Avoid the turrets as they'll undo all your work in an instant! 
  • Fell free to use scribbles as cover but be careful! Stay too long and they'll get you too!

 #minijam
